        {

        	"particle"				"particles/roshpit/omniro/dimension_stalk_attack.vpcf"

        }

        "AbilityManaCost"   "0"
        "SideShop"  "1"
        "OnSpellStart"
        {
            "ApplyModifier"
            {
                "Target"    "CASTER"
                "ModifierName"  "modifier_channel_start"
                "Duration"      "1.5"
            }
            "RunScript"
            {
                "ScriptFile"    "heroes/faceless_void/dimension_stalker.lua"
                "Function"      "dimension_stalker_channel_start"
                "target"        "POINT"
                "radius"		"%radius"
            }
        }

        "OnChannelSucceeded"
        {
            "RemoveModifier"
            {
                "Target"    "CASTER"
                "ModifierName"  "modifier_channel_start"
            }

            "RunScript"
            {
                "ScriptFile"    "heroes/faceless_void/dimension_stalker.lua"
                "Function"      "fire_dimension_stalker"
                "target"        "POINT"
                "max_targets"	"%max_targets"
                "radius"		"%radius"
            }

        }

        "OnChannelFinish"
        {
            "RunScript"
            {
                "ScriptFile"    "heroes/faceless_void/dimension_stalker.lua"
                "Function"      "remove_modifier_channel_start"
            }

        }

        "OnChannelInterrupted"
        {
            "RunScript"
            {
                "ScriptFile"    "heroes/faceless_void/dimension_stalker.lua"
                "Function"      "remove_modifier_channel_start"
            }

        }

        {
            "modifier_channel_start"

                "IsHidden"  "1"

                {

                        "ScriptFile"    "heroes/util/channeling.lua"
                        "Function"      "beginChannel"
                    }

                    {
                        "ScriptFile"    "heroes/util/channeling.lua"
                        "Function"      "endChannel"
                    }
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"    "heroes/faceless_void/dimension_stalker.lua"
                        "Function"      "dimension_stalker_channel_end"
                    }
                }
                "ThinkInterval"  "0.03"
                "OnIntervalThink"
                {
                    "RunScript"

                        "ScriptFile"    "heroes/faceless_void/dimension_stalker.lua"

	"arkimus_zap_ring"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_CANCEL_MOVEMENT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE"
		"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"arkimus/arkimus_magnetic_flux"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"  "0"
		"MaxLevel"				 "7"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"

		// Precache
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"precache"
		{
			"particle"	"particles/roshpit/arkimus/arcana_zap_field.vpcf"
		}

		// Casting
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0"

		// Time
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCooldown"				"10"
		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"0"

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"duration"			"16"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"damage"			"200 500 2000 5000 12000 50000 90000"
			}
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"int_damage"		"20 50 80 220 300 360 400"
			}
		}
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/antimage/arcana_zap_field.lua"
				"Function"		"arcana_zap_field_start"
				"duration"		"%duration"
			}
		}
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_zap_field"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"0"
				"IsBuff"	"1"
				"ThinkInterval"  "0.03"
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/antimage/arcana_zap_field.lua"
						"Function"		"zap_field_modifier_start"
					}
				}
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/antimage/arcana_zap_field.lua"
						"Function"		"zap_field_modifier_thinker"
						"damage"		"%damage"
						"int_damage"    "%int_damage"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/antimage/arcana_zap_field.lua"
						"Function"		"zap_field_modifier_end"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_zonis_stun_arcana1"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"IsStunDebuff"			"1"
				"EffectName"		"particles/roshpit/items/violet_guard_2.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
				"OverrideAnimation"     "ACT_DOTA_FLAIL"
			}
			"modifier_arkimus_arcana1_passive"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"Passive"	"1"

				"OnTakeDamage"
				// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value after mitigation
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/antimage/arcana_zap_field.lua"
						"Function"		"damage_taken"
						"damage"		"%attack_damage"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_arkimus_arcana1_q3"
			{

		"AbilityCastPoint"	"0.0"
		"AbilityCooldown"	"24"
		"AbilityChannelTime"	"2.0"
		"AbilityCastRange"				"580"
		"AOERadius"						"580"
		"AbilityCastAnimation"	"ACT_DOTA_TELEPORT"
		"AbilityType"            "DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
		"RequiredLevel"          		"-5"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"  		"10"
		"MaxLevel"				 		"7"
		"precache"
		{
			"particle"			"particles/roshpit/arkimus/channel_energy.vpcf"
			"particle"			"particles/base_attacks/astral_glyph_2_1_projectile.vpcf"
			"particle"			"particles/econ/items/wisp/wisp_guardian_explosion_ti7.vpcf"
		}

		"AbilityManaCost"	"0"
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/antimage/archon_form.lua"
				"Function"		"start_channel"

			}

		}
		"OnChannelSucceeded"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/antimage/archon_form.lua"
				"Function"		"channel_complete"
				"duration"	"%duration"
			}
		}

		"OnChannelFinish"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelInterrupted"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/antimage/archon_form.lua"
				"Function"		"channel_interrupt"
			}
		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_channel_start"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"Target"					"TARGET"
						"EffectName"				"particles/roshpit/arkimus/channel_energy.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"			"attach_hitloc"
						"EffectLifeDurationScale"	"1"
						"EffectColorA"				"160 160 255"
						"EffectAlphaScale"			"0.85"
					}
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"
						"Function"		"beginChannel"
					}

				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"
						"Function"		"endChannel"
					}
				}

			}
			"modifier_arkimus_archon_form"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"IsStunDebuff"			"1"

	"enhchant_tomahawk"
	{
		"AbilityBehavior"	"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED"
		"BaseClass"	"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityTextureName"	"warlord/warlord_enchant_tomahawk"
		"AbilityCastPoint"	"0.0"
		"AbilityCooldown"	"12"
		"AbilityChannelTime"	"1.0"
		"AbilityCastAnimation"	"ACT_DOTA_TELEPORT"
		"AbilityType"            "DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
		"RequiredLevel"          		"-5"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"  		"10"
		"MaxLevel"				 		"7"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
		"precache"
		{

		}

		"AbilityManaCost"	"0"
		"SideShop"	"1"
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/beastmaster/enchant_tomahawk.lua"
				"Function"		"start_channel"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelSucceeded"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/beastmaster/enchant_tomahawk.lua"
				"Function"		"tomahawk_start"
				"duration"		"%duration"
			}
		}

		"OnChannelFinish"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelInterrupted"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/beastmaster/enchant_tomahawk.lua"
				"Function"		"channel_interrupt"
			}
		}
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_channel_start"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"	"particles/roshpit/warlord/elemental_overload_channel.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
						"Target"	"CASTER"
						"ControlPointEntities"
						{
							"CASTER"	"attach_origin"
							"CASTER"	"attach_origin"
							"CASTER"	"attach_origin"
						}

					}
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"
						"Function"		"beginChannel"
					}

				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"
						"Function"		"endChannel"
					}
				}

			}
			"modifier_enchant_tomahawk_buff"

	"sorceress_arcana_ice_tornado"
	{
		"AbilityBehavior"	"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED"
		"BaseClass"	"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityTextureName"	"sorceress/glacial_vortex"
		"AbilityCastPoint"	"0.0"
		"AbilityCooldown"	"12"
		"AbilityChannelTime"	"2.0"
		"AbilityCastRange"				"1450"
		"AbilityCastAnimation"	"ACT_DOTA_TELEPORT_STATUE"
		"AbilityType"            "DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"	"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
		"RequiredLevel"          		"-5"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"  		"10"
		"MaxLevel"				 		"7"
		"precache"
		{

		}

		"AbilityManaCost"	"0"
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/crystal_maiden/ice_tornado.lua"
				"Function"		"start_channel"
				"target"		"POINT"
				"max_tornados"	"%max_tornados"
			}

		}
		"OnChannelSucceeded"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/crystal_maiden/ice_tornado.lua"
				"Function"		"channel_complete"
				"target"		"POINT"
				"max_tornados"	"%max_tornados"
			}
		}

		"OnChannelFinish"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelInterrupted"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/crystal_maiden/ice_tornado.lua"
				"Function"		"channel_interrupt"
			}
		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_channel_start"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"OverrideAnimation"     "ACT_DOTA_TELEPORT_STATUE"
				"EffectName"	"particles/roshpit/sorceress/ice_lance_cast.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType" "follow_origin"
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"
						"Function"		"beginChannel"
					}

				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"
						"Function"		"endChannel"
					}
				}

			}
			"modifier_ice_tornado_passive"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"Passive"	"1"
				"Attributes"		"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_PERMANENT"
				"OnDeath"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/crystal_maiden/ice_tornado.lua"
						"Function"		"owner_die"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_tornado_thinker"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"0"
				"IsDebuff"	"1"
				"IsStunDebuff"	"1"
				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_NO_UNIT_COLLISION"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_NOT_ON_MINIMAP"			"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_INVULNERABLE"			"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_NO_HEALTH_BAR"			"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
				"ThinkInterval"  "0.03"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/crystal_maiden/ice_tornado.lua"
						"Function"		"tornado_thinker"
						"target"		"TARGET"
						"damage"		"%damage"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/crystal_maiden/ice_tornado.lua"
						"Function"		"tornado_thinker_end"
						"target"		"TARGET"
					}
				}
				"Aura"          	"modifier_enemy_inside_tornado"
				"Aura_Radius"   	"350"
				"Aura_Teams"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
				"Aura_Types"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
				"Aura_Flags"    	"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_FLAG_NONE"
				"Aura_ApplyToCaster" "0"
			}
			"modifier_enemy_inside_tornado"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"0"
				"IsDebuff"	"1"
				"IsStunDebuff"	"1"
				"Properties"
				{
				    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "%move_slow"
				}

	{
		"AbilityBehavior"	"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED"
		"BaseClass"	"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityTextureName"	"viper_nethertoxin"
		"AbilityCastRange"	"1000"
		"AbilityCastPoint"	"0.0"
		"AbilityCooldown"	"20.0"
		"AbilityChannelTime"	"1.5"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
		"AbilityType"            "DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
		"RequiredLevel"          		"-5"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"  		"10"
		"MaxLevel"				 		"7"

		"AbilityManaCost"	"0"
		"SideShop"	"1"
		"precache"
		{
			"model"     "models/heroes/viper/viper_back.vmdl"
			"particle"	"particles/roshpit/venomort/viper_cast.vpcf"
			"particle"	"particles/roshpit/venomort/viper_channel_flare.vpcf"
		}
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"scripts/vscripts/heroes/hero_necrolyte/viper.lua"
				"Function"		"begin_channel"
			}
		}
		"OnChannelSucceeded"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"scripts/vscripts/heroes/hero_necrolyte/viper.lua"
				"Function"		"cast"
				"damage"		"%damage"
				"health"        "%health"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelFinish"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelInterrupted"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"scripts/vscripts/heroes/hero_necrolyte/viper.lua"
				"Function"		"channel_interrupt"
			}
		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_channel_start"
			{
				"EffectName"	"particles/roshpit/venomort/viper_cast.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"attach_origin"
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"

					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"

						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"

					}
				}

				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"scripts/vscripts/heroes/hero_necrolyte/viper.lua"

					}
				}
			}

		"AbilityChannelTime"	"3.0"

		"AbilityType"            "DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
		"RequiredLevel"          		"-5"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"  		"10"
		"MaxLevel"				 		"7"
		"precache"
		{
			"particle"			"particles/roshpit/spirit_warrior/ancient_vigor_charge_iron.vpcf"
			"particle"			"particles/roshpit/spirit_warrior/ancient_vigor_buff.vpcf"
			"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_skeletonking/wraith_king_vampiric_aura_lifesteal.vpcf"
			"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_legion_commander/legion_commander_courage_hit.vpcf"
		}

		"AbilityManaCost"	"0"
		"SideShop"	"1"
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/huskar/ancient_vigor.lua"
				"Function"		"start_channel"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelSucceeded"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/huskar/ancient_vigor.lua"
				"Function"		"vigor_start"
				"duration"		"%duration"
			}
		}

		"OnChannelFinish"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelInterrupted"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/huskar/ancient_vigor.lua"
				"Function"		"channel_interrupt"
			}
		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_channel_start"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"EffectName"	"particles/roshpit/spirit_warrior/ancient_vigor_charge_iron.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
						"Target"	"CASTER"
						"ControlPointEntities"
						{
							"CASTER"	"attach_origin"
							"CASTER"	"attach_origin"
							"CASTER"	"attach_origin"
						}

					}
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"
						"Function"		"beginChannel"
					}

				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"
						"Function"		"endChannel"
					}
				}

			}

		{

				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

			{
				"EffectName"	"invoker_invo_laugh_03"
				"Target"	"CASTER"
			}

		}

		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

			{
				"ScriptFile"	"scripts/vscripts/heroes/invoker/elemental_deity.lua"
				"Function"		"begin_deity"
				"target"		"POINT"
				"attack_damage_mult"	"%attack_damage_mult"
				"armor_mult"			"%armor_mult"
				"health_mult"			"%health_mult"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelFinish"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelInterrupted"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_channel_start"
			{
				"EffectName"		"particles/items2_fx/veil_of_discord_debuff.vpcf"

					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"
						"Function"		"endChannel"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_deity_appear"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"States"

					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MAGICAL_RESISTANCE_BONUS" "%aspect_magic_resist"
				}

				// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value before mitigation

						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/invoker/immolation.lua"

	"trapper_arcana_venom_whip"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_CANCEL_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AOE"
		"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"trapper/trapper_arcana_venom_whip"
		"RequiredLevel"          		"-5"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"  		"10"
		"MaxLevel"				 		"7"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
		"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_ATTACK"
		"AbilityCastRange"				"900 950 1000 1050 1100 1150 1200"
		"AOERadius"						"380"

		// Precache
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		// Casting
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.35"

		// Time
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCooldown"				"0"

		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"180 400 800 1400 2000 2400 2800"

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"radius"			"380"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"range"			    "900 950 1000 1050 1100 1150 1200"
			}
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_FLOAT"
				"cooldown"			"3.5 3.4 3.3 3.2 3.1 3.0 2.9"
			}
			"04"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"attack_mult_per_stack"			"30 50 70 90 130 180 240"
			}
			"05"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"move_slow_per_stack"			"-12"
			}
		}
		"OnAbilityPhaseStart"
		{
			"FireSound"
			{
				"EffectName"	"Trapper.LassoCast.VO"
				"Target" 		"CASTER"
			}
		}
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
        		"ScriptFile"	"heroes/lanaya/lasso.lua"
        		"Function"		"trapper_poison_whip_start"
        		"Target"		"POINT"
        		"radius"		"%radius"
			}
		}
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_poison_whip"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"IsStunDebuff"			"1"

				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_venomancer/venomancer_poison_debuff.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT" "%move_slow_per_stack"
				}
				"ThinkInterval"  "0.2"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/lanaya/lasso.lua"
						"Function"		"poison_whip_think"
						"target"		"TARGET"
						"attack_mult"	"%attack_mult_per_stack"
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		"AbilityCastPoint"	"0.0"
		"AbilityCooldown"	"20.0"

		"AbilityCastRange"				"600"
		"AOERadius"						"780"
		"AbilityCastAnimation"	"ACT_DOTA_VICTORY"
		"AbilityType"            "DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"	"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
		"RequiredLevel"          		"-5"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"  		"10"
		"MaxLevel"				 		"7"
		"AbilityDamage"				"5400 18000 45000 110000 240000 540000 900000"
		"precache"
		{

		}

		"AbilityManaCost"	"0"
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/legion_commander/hailstorm.lua"
				"Function"		"start_channel"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelSucceeded"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/legion_commander/hailstorm.lua"
				"Function"		"channel_complete"
				"Target"			"POINT"
				"radius"		"%AOERadius"
				"damage"		"%AbilityDamage"
				"numExplosions"	"%explosions"
			}
		}

		"OnChannelFinish"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelInterrupted"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/legion_commander/hailstorm.lua"
				"Function"		"channel_interrupt"
			}
		}

	{
		"AbilityBehavior"	"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED"
		"BaseClass"	"ability_datadriven"

		"AbilityUnitDamageType"	"DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"

		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"  		"10"
		"MaxLevel"				 		"7"
		"precache"
		{


		}

		"AbilityManaCost"	"0"
		"SideShop"	"1"
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
				"Duration"		"2"
			}

			"FireSound"
			{
				"EffectName"	"leshrac_lesh_pain_04"
				"Target"	"CASTER"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/leshrac/bahamut_arcana_ult.lua"
				"Function"		"start_channel"
			}
		}

		"OnChannelSucceeded"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_light_charging"
				"Target" 		"CASTER"
				"Duration"		"0.9"
			}
			"FireSound"
			{
				"EffectName"	"leshrac_lesh_happy_04"
				"Target"	"CASTER"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/leshrac/bahamut_arcana_ult.lua"
				"Function"		"begin_bahamut_arcana_ult"
				"duration"		"%duration"
			}
		}

		"OnChannelFinish"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelInterrupted"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/leshrac/bahamut_arcana_ult.lua"
				"Function"		"break_channel"
			}
		}
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_channel_start"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"OverrideAnimation"     "ACT_DOTA_VICTORY"
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"
						"Function"		"beginChannel"
					}
					"AttachEffect"
					{
						"Target"					"TARGET"
						"EffectName"				"particles/econ/generic/generic_buff_1/charge_of_light_effect_buff.vpcf"
						"EffectAttachType"			"attach_origin"
						"EffectLifeDurationScale"	"1"
						"EffectColorA"				"40 120 255"
						"EffectAlphaScale"			"0.7"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/util/channeling.lua"
						"Function"		"endChannel"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_leshrac_arcana_effect"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"0"

					}
				}

					"AttachEffect"

	"draghor_shapeshift_bear"
	{
		"AbilityBehavior"	"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED"

		{
			"ApplyModifier"

				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/monkey_king/shapeshift"
				"Function"		"start_channel"

			}

		}
		"OnChannelSucceeded"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"

			}
		}

			"RemoveModifier"

				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
		}

			}

    "astral_arcana_ability"
    {
        // General
        //-------------------------------------------------------
        "BaseClass"                     "ability_datadriven"
        "AbilityBehavior"               "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING"
        "FightRecapLevel"               "1"
        "AbilityTextureName"            "astral_ranger/astral_arcana_ability"
        "RequiredLevel"                 "-5"
        "LevelsBetweenUpgrades"         "10"
        "MaxLevel"                      "7"
        "AbilityUnitDamageType"         "DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"
        "AbilityCastAnimation"          "ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_2"

        // Precache
        //-------------------------------------------------------
        "precache"
        {

        }

        // Casting
        //-------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityCastPoint"              "0.3"

        // Time
        //-------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityCooldown"               "14"
        "AbilityDuration"               "5"

        // Cost
        //-------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilityManaCost"               "0"

        // Special
        //-------------------------------------------------------
        "AbilitySpecial"
        {
            "01"
            {
                "var_type"          "FIELD_FLOAT"
                "duration"      "5 5.5 6 6.5 7 7.5 8"
            }
        }

        "OnSpellStart"
        {
            "RunScript"
            {
                "ScriptFile"    "heroes/moon_ranger/astral_arcana_ability.lua"
                "Function"      "astral_arcana_start"

            }
        }
        "Modifiers"
        {
            "modifier_astral_arcana_lifting"
            {
                "Passive"           "0"
                "IsHidden"          "1"
                "IsDebuff"          "0"
                "OverrideAnimation"     "ACT_DOTA_FLAIL"
                "OnCreated"
                {
                    "AttachEffect"
                    {
                        "Target"                    "TARGET"
                        "EffectName"                "particles/econ/generic/generic_buff_1/charge_of_light_effect_buff.vpcf"
                        "EffectAttachType"          "attach_origin"
                        "EffectLifeDurationScale"   "1"
                        "EffectColorA"              "120 40 200"
                        "EffectAlphaScale"          "1"
                    }
                }
                "ThinkInterval"  "0.03"
                "OnIntervalThink"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"    "heroes/moon_ranger/astral_arcana_ability.lua"
                        "Function"      "astral_arcana_lifting_think"
                        "duration"      "%duration"
                    }
                }
                "States"
                {
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_ROOTED"     "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_DISARMED"   "MODIFIER_STATE_DISARMED"
                }
            }
            "modifier_astral_arcana_a_a_effect"
            {
                "IsHidden"  "1"
                "Properties"
                {
                    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACK_RANGE_BONUS" "12"
                }
            }
            "modifier_astral_arcana_on_platform"
            {
                "IsHidden"  "0"
                "States"
                {
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_ATTACK_IMMUNE"      "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_ROOTED"             "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                }
                "Properties"
                {
                    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_BONUS_DAY_VISION" "800"
                    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_BONUS_NIGHT_VISION" "800"
                }
                "ThinkInterval"  "0.5"
                "OnIntervalThink"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"    "heroes/moon_ranger/astral_arcana_ability.lua"
                        "Function"      "on_cloud_think"
                    }
                }
                "OnDeath"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"    "heroes/moon_ranger/astral_arcana_ability.lua"
                        "Function"      "arcana_platform_move"
                    }
                }
                "OnDestroy"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"    "heroes/moon_ranger/astral_arcana_ability.lua"
                        "Function"      "arcana_platform_move"
                    }
                    "RemoveModifier"
                    {
                        "ModifierName"  "modifier_astral_arcana_a_a_effect"
                        "Target"        "TARGET"
                    }
                    "RemoveModifier"
                    {
                        "ModifierName"  "modifier_astral_rune_q_3"
                        "Target"        "TARGET"
                    }
                }
            }
            "modifier_astral_arcana_falling"
            {
                "IsHidden"  "1"
                "OverrideAnimation"     "ACT_DOTA_FLAIL"
                "ThinkInterval"  "0.03"
                "OnIntervalThink"
                {
                    "RunScript"
                    {
                        "ScriptFile"    "heroes/moon_ranger/astral_arcana_ability.lua"

                {
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_ROOTED"     "MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
                    "MODIFIER_STATE_DISARMED"   "MODIFIER_STATE_DISARMED"
                }
            }
            "modifier_astral_arcana_passive"
            {
                "Passive"   "1"
                "IsHidden"  "1"

                "OnAttackLanded"

                    }
                }
            }

	"crystal_arrow"
    {
        "AbilityBehavior"   "DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_CHANNELLED | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AOE"
        "BaseClass" "ability_datadriven"
        "AOERadius" "550"
        "AbilityTextureName"    "astral_ranger/crystal_arrow"
        "AbilityCastRange"  "1800"
        "AbilityCastPoint"  "0.0"
        "AbilityCooldown"   "10.0"
        "AbilityChannelTime"    "1.5"
        "AbilityUnitDamageType" "DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"
        "AbilityCastAnimation"  "ACT_DOTA_TAUNT"
        "AbilityType"            "DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"
        "RequiredLevel"                 "-5"
        "LevelsBetweenUpgrades"         "10"
        "MaxLevel"                      "7"
        "precache"
        {

        }

        "AbilityManaCost"   "0"
        "SideShop"  "1"
        "OnSpellStart"
        {
            "ApplyModifier"
            {
                "Target"    "CASTER"
                "ModifierName"  "modifier_channel_start"
                "Duration"      "1.5"
            }

            "FireSound"
            {
                "EffectName"    "Hero_Luna.LucentBeam.Cast"
                "Target"    "CASTER"
            }
            "AttachEffect"
            {
                "EffectName"    "particles/econ/items/leshrac/leshrac_tormented_staff/leshrac_split_sparkles_tormented.vpcf"
                "EffectAttachType"  "follow_origin"
                "EffectRadius"  "200"
                "EffectDurationScale"   "1.5"
                "EffectLifeDurationScale"   "1"
                "EffectColorA"  "200 200 0"
                "EffectColorB"  "200 200 0"
                "Target"    "CASTER"
            }
            "RunScript"
            {
                "ScriptFile"    "heroes/moon_ranger/abilities/arcana/crystal_arrow.lua"
                "Function"      "crystal_arrow_channel_start"
                "target"        "POINT"
            }
        }

        "OnChannelSucceeded"
        {
            "RemoveModifier"
            {
                "Target"    "CASTER"
                "ModifierName"  "modifier_channel_start"
            }

            "RunScript"
            {
                "ScriptFile"    "heroes/moon_ranger/abilities/arcana/crystal_arrow.lua"
                "Function"      "fire_crystal_arrow"
                "target"        "POINT"
            }

        }

        "OnChannelFinish"
        {
            "RunScript"
            {
                "ScriptFile"    "heroes/moon_ranger/abilities/arcana/crystal_arrow.lua"
                "Function"      "remove_modifier_channel_start"
                "TARGET"        "POINT"
            }

        }

        "OnChannelInterrupted"
        {
            "RunScript"
            {

	"voltex_lightning_dash"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING"
		"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"voltex/voltex_storm_rush"
		"RequiredLevel"          		"-5"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"  		"10"
		"MaxLevel"				 		"7"
		"AbilityCastRange"				"1000 1050 1100 1150 1200 1250 1300"
		"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_2"

		// Precache
		//-------------------------------------------------------
	    "precache"
	    {

	    }

		// Casting
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0"

		// Time
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCooldown"				"4"

		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"0"

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"damage_reduction_percent"	"45 50 55 60 65 70 75"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"cast_range"	"1000 1125 1250 1375 1500 1625 1750"
			}

		}

		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/phantom_assassin/lightning_dash.lua"
				"Function"		"begin_lightning_dash"
				"Target"		"POINT"
			}
		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_lightning_dash"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"IsBuff"	"1"
				"OverrideAnimation"     "ACT_DOTA_VERSUS"
				"EffectName"	"particles/units/heroes/hero_stormspirit/stormspirit_ball_lightning.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"attach_hitloc"
				"ThinkInterval"  "0.03"
				"IsHidden"		"1"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/phantom_assassin/lightning_dash.lua"
						"Function"		"dash_think"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/phantom_assassin/lightning_dash.lua"
						"Function"		"dash_end"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_voltex_arcana1_passive"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"Passive"	"1"
				"Attributes"		"MODIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_PERMANENT"
				"OnTakeDamage"
				// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value after mitigation
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/phantom_assassin/lightning_dash.lua"
						"Function"		"arcana_take_damage"
						"damage"		"%attack_damage"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RemoveModifier"
					{
						"ModifierName"	"modifier_lightning_dash_freecast"
						"Target" 		"TARGET"
					}
				}
				"ThinkInterval"  "1.0"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/phantom_assassin/lightning_dash.lua"
						"Function"		"add_free_casts"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_lightning_dash_freecast"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"0"
				"IsBuff"	"1"
			}
			"modifier_voltex_lightning_dash_regen"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"0"
				"IsBuff"	"1"
				"ThinkInterval"  "0.1"
				"TextureName"	"voltex/voltex_rune_e_3_arcana1"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/phantom_assassin/lightning_dash.lua"
						"Function"		"regen_think"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/phantom_assassin/lightning_dash.lua"
						"Function"		"regen_end"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_voltex_lightning_dash_regen_hidden"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_HEALTH_REGEN_CONSTANT" "1"
				}
			}
		}
	}

			}

			}

		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/slardar/arcana/flood_basin.lua"
				"Function"		"flood_basin_start_channel"
				"radius"		"%radius"

			}

		}
		"OnChannelSucceeded"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/slardar/arcana/flood_basin.lua"
				"Function"		"flood_basin_start"
				"radius"		"%radius"
			}
		}

		"OnChannelFinish"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelInterrupted"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/slardar/tsunami.lua"
				"Function"		"channel_interrupt"
			}
		}

	"slipfinn_jump"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_CANCEL_MOVEMENT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE"
		"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"slipfinn/puddle_jump"
		"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_3"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"  "0"
		"MaxLevel"				 "7"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGICAL"

		// Precache
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"precache"
		{
			"particle"		"particles/econ/items/lion/fish_stick/fish_stick_splash.vpcf"
			"particle"		"particles/roshpit/slipfinn/dark_bog_fallback_mid_egset.vpcf"
		}

		// Casting
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0"

		// Time
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCooldown"				"0"
		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"20 50 80 120 180 260 360"

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"height_immune"			"330 310 290 270 250 230 210"
			}
		}
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/slark/jump.lua"
				"Function"		"slipfinn_jump_start"
			}
		}
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_slipfinn_passive"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"Passive"	"1"
				"ThinkInterval"  "0.03"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/slark/jump.lua"
						"Function"		"slipfinn_main_thinker"
						"height_immune"	"%height_immune"
					}
				}
				"OnAbilityStart"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/slark/bubble_possession.lua"
						"Function"		"spell_precast"
					}
				}
				"OnAbilityExecuted"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/slark/bubble_possession.lua"
						"Function"		"spell_cast"
					}
				}
				"OnAttackLanded"
				// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value before mitigation
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/slark/shadow_rush.lua"
						"Function"		"slipfinn_attack_land"
						"damage"		"%attack_damage"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_slipfinn_basic_jump"
			{
				"IsHidden" "1"
				"ThinkInterval"  "0.03"
				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_ROOTED"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_TURN_RATE_PERCENTAGE"	"-300"
				}
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/slark/jump.lua"
						"Function"		"slipfinn_jump_think"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_slipfinn_jump_phase"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/slark/jump.lua"
						"Function"		"jump_phase_reset"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_jump_not_attackable"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_ATTACK_IMMUNE"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
			}
			"modifier_slipfinn_gloomshade_visible"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"0"
				"IsDebuff"	"1"
				"IsStunDebuff"	"1"

			"particle" "particles/econ/items/spirit_breaker/spirit_breaker_iron_surge/spirit_breaker_charge_iron.vpcf"
			"particle" "particles/units/heroes/hero_spirit_breaker/spirit_breaker_nether_strike_begin.vpcf"
		}

		"AbilityManaCost"	"0"
		"SideShop"	"1"
		"OnSpellStart"
		{

			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/spirit_breaker/duskbringer_4_r.lua"
				"Function"		"seven_visions_channel"
			}

			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

			{
				"EffectName"	"Hero_Spirit_Breaker.NetherStrike.Begin"
				"Target"	"CASTER"
			}

		}

		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}

			"RemoveModifier"

			}

			}

				"OnDealDamage"

					"RunScript"

						"Function"		"deal_damage_with_arcana_equipped"

	"dinath_dragon_fire"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_NO_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_CHANNEL | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_DONT_CANCEL_MOVEMENT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IMMEDIATE | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_TOGGLE"
		"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"dinath/spire_breath"
		"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_3"
		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"  "0"
		"MaxLevel"				 "7"
		"AbilityUnitDamageType"			"DAMAGE_TYPE_PURE"

		// Precache
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"precache"
		{

		}

		// Casting
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0"

		// Time
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCooldown"				"0"
		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"30 60 140 400 800 1400 2000"

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"damage_mult"			"30 60 90 120 150 180 210"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"mana_cost"			"30 60 140 400 800 1400 2000"
			}
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"extra_range"			"200 220 240 260 280 300 320"
			}
			"04"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"max_targets"			"4 4 5 5 6 6 7"
			}
		}
		"OnToggleOn"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_spire_breath"
				"Target" 		"CASTER"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/winter_wyvern/spire_breath.lua"
				"Function"		"spire_toggle_on"
			}
		}
		"OnToggleOff"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_spire_breath"
				"Target" 		"CASTER"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/winter_wyvern/spire_breath.lua"
				"Function"		"spire_toggle_off"
			}
		}
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_spire_breath_passive"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"Passive"	"1"
				"OnAttackLanded"
				// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value before mitigation
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/winter_wyvern/spire_breath.lua"
						"Function"		"spire_breath_attack_land"
						"damage_mult"	"%damage_mult"
					}
				}
				"ThinkInterval"  "1.0"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/winter_wyvern/spire_breath.lua"
						"Function"		"spire_passive_think"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_spire_breath"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_ATTACK_RANGE_BONUS" "%extra_range"
				}
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/winter_wyvern/spire_breath.lua"
						"Function"		"spire_breath_on"
						"drain_mana"	"0"
					}
				}
				"OnAttackStart"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/winter_wyvern/spire_breath.lua"
						"Function"		"spire_attack_start"
						"splits"		"%max_targets"
					}
				}
				"ThinkInterval"  "1.0"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/winter_wyvern/spire_breath.lua"
						"Function"		"spire_on_mana_drain"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_breath_lock"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
			}
			"modifier_spire_breath_speed_burst"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"0"
				"TextureName" "dinath/dinath_rune_w_3_arcana1"
				"Properties"
				{
				    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_CONSTANT" "1" 
				}
				"ThinkInterval"  "0.03"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/winter_wyvern/spire_breath.lua"
						"Function"		"spire_breath_speed_burst_think"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_spire_breath_a_b_buff"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"Properties"
				{
					"MODIFIER_PROPERTY_BASEDAMAGEOUTGOING_PERCENTAGE" "8"
				}
			}
		}
	}

	"dinath_dragon_dive"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"						"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_POINT | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_AOE"

		"AOERadius"						"240"
		"AbilityCastRange"				"1700 1850 2000 2150 2300 2450 2600"
		"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_CAST_ABILITY_2"

		// Precache
		//-------------------------------------------------------
	    "precache"
	    {
	    	"soundfile"			"soundevents/game_sounds_dinath.vsndevts"
	    	"particle"			"particles/roshpit/dinath/dive_rush.vpcf"
	    	"particle"			"particles/units/heroes/hero_winter_wyvern/wyvern_arctic_burn_buff.vpcf"
	    }

		// Casting
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.3"

		// Time
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCooldown"				"3.2"

		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"0"

		// Special
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"				"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"cast_range"	"1700 1850 2000 2150 2300 2450 2600"
			}
		}
		"OnAbilityPhaseStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/winter_wyvern/dragon_dive.lua"
				"Function"		"dinath_dive_precast"
				"Target"		"POINT"
			}
		}
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/winter_wyvern/dragon_dive.lua"
				"Function"		"begin_dinath_dive"
				"Target"		"POINT"
			}
		}

		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_dinath_charge_passive"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"Passive"	"1"
				"ThinkInterval"  "1.0"
				"OnIntervalThink"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"heroes/winter_wyvern/dragon_dive.lua"
						"Function"		"dinath_charge_passive_think"
					}
				}
			}

		"AbilityCastAnimation"	"ACT_DOTA_TELEPORT"
		"AbilityType"            "DOTA_ABILITY_TYPE_ULTIMATE"

		"LevelsBetweenUpgrades"  		"10"
		"MaxLevel"				 		"7"

		{
			"particle"	"particles/roshpit/dinath/hyperbeam_orb_ball_lightning.vpcf"
			"particle"	"particles/roshpit/dinath/channel_hyper.vpcf"
			"particle"	"particles/roshpit/dinath/hyper_freeze.vpcf"
			"particle"	"particles/roshpit/dinath/hyper_zap_beam.vpcf"
		}

		"AbilityManaCost"	"0"
		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"ApplyModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_animation"
				"Target" 		"CASTER"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/winter_wyvern/hyper_beam"
				"Function"		"hyperbeam_start_channel"
				"target"		"POINT"
				"radius"		"%radius"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelSucceeded"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/winter_wyvern/hyper_beam"
				"Function"		"hyper_beam_finish_channel"
				"Target"			"POINT"
				"radius"		"%radius"
			}
		}

		"OnChannelFinish"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}

		}

		"OnChannelInterrupted"
		{
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"Target"	"CASTER"
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_start"
			}
			"RemoveModifier"
			{
				"ModifierName"	"modifier_channel_animation"
				"Target" 		"TARGET"
			}

			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/winter_wyvern/hyper_beam"
				"Function"		"hyperbeam_interrupt_channel"
			}
		}

		"Modifiers"

					}

				{

					}

		"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET | DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_IGNORE_BACKSWING"
		"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"
		"AbilityUnitTargetType"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_HERO | DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_BASIC"
		"FightRecapLevel"				"1"
		"AbilityTextureName"			"rpc/paladin_r_4"
		"MaxLevel"						"7"
		"AbilityCastAnimation"			"ACT_DOTA_ATTACK"

		// Precache
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

		// Casting
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCastRange"				"800"
		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.4 0.4 0.4 0.4"

		// Time
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityCooldown"				"10"

		// Damage.
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityDamage"					"0"

		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"0"


		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/omniknight/paladin_4_r_summon.lua"
				"Function"		"purifying_spark_start"
				"target"		"TARGET"
			}
		}
		"OnProjectileHitUnit"
		{
			"DeleteOnHit"	"1"
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"heroes/omniknight/paladin_4_r_summon.lua"
				"Function"		"purifying_spark_hit"
				"target"		"TARGET"
			}
		}

				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"

			}

	"curse_of_belial"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"BaseClass"				"ability_datadriven"
		"AbilityBehavior"				"DOTA_ABILITY_BEHAVIOR_UNIT_TARGET"
		"AbilityUnitTargetTeam"			"DOTA_UNIT_TARGET_TEAM_ENEMY"

		"AbilityTextureName"			"winterblight/p2/curse_of_belial"

		// Precache
		//-------------------------------------------------------

		// Casting
		//-------------------------------------------------------

		"AbilityCastPoint"				"0.2"

		// Time
		//-------------------------------------------------------

		// Damage.
		//-------------------------------------------------------

		// Cost
		//-------------------------------------------------------
		"AbilityManaCost"				"0"

		"AbilitySpecial"
		{
			"01"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"pct_damage_on_spell_cast"			"4 6 8"
			}
			"02"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"base_attack_damage_reduction"			"40 60 80"
			}
			"03"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"movement_slow"			"-20 -25 -30"
			}
			"04"
			{
				"var_type"			"FIELD_INTEGER"
				"duration"			"8"
			}
		}

		"OnSpellStart"
		{
			"RunScript"
			{
				"ScriptFile"	"worlds/winterblight/monsters/winterblight_cavern_monsters"
				"Function"		"curse_of_belial_start"
				"target"		"TARGET"
				"base_attack_damage_reduction"		"%base_attack_damage_reduction"
				"duration"							"%duration"
			}

		}
		"Modifiers"
		{
			"modifier_curse_of_belial"
			{
				"Passive"			"0"
				"IsHidden"			"0"
				"IsDebuff"			"1"
				"EffectName"		"particles/units/heroes/hero_grimstroke/grimstroke_soulchain_debuff.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"attach_origin"
				"Properties"
				{
				    "MODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE" "%movement_slow" 
				}
				"OnAbilityExecuted"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"worlds/winterblight/monsters/winterblight_cavern_monsters"
						"Function"		"curse_of_belial_cast"
						"pct_damage_on_spell_cast"	"%pct_damage_on_spell_cast"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RemoveModifier"
					{
						"Target"	"TARGET"
						"ModifierName"	"curse_of_belial_attack_damage_reduce"
					}
				}
			}
			"curse_of_belial_attack_damage_reduce"
			{
				"IsHidden"	"1"
				"IsDebuff"	"1"
				"Properties"

				"OnAttackLanded"
				// "%attack_damage" is set to the damage value before mitigation

					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"worlds/tanari/monsters/champions_path_ai"
						"Function"		"mountain_pass_guardian_attack_land"
					}
				}
			}
			"modifier_mountain_pass_guardian_pull"
			{
				"Passive" 	"0"
				"IsDebuff"	"1"
				"IsStunDebuff"	"1"
				"OverrideAnimation"     "ACT_DOTA_FLAIL"
				"States"

					"MODIFIER_STATE_STUNNED"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}

	"arena_descent_doom"
	{
		// General
		//-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	"tanari_lava_bully_ai"
	{

					{
						"ScriptFile"	"worlds/sea_fortress/sea_fortress_ai"
						"Function"		"comet_think"
					}
				}
				"OnDestroy"
				{
					"RunScript"
					{
						"ScriptFile"	"worlds/sea_fortress/sea_fortress_ai"
						"Function"		"comet_storm_end"
						"damage"		"%base_damage"
						"str_mult"		"%damage_from_str"
					}
				}
				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_ROOTED"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
					"MODIFIER_STATE_ATTACK_IMMUNE"	"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
			}
			"modifier_black_King_bar_immunity"
			{
				"Passive"	"0"
				"IsHidden" "0"
				"ThinkInterval"  "4.0"
				"TextureName"	"paladin/paladin_rune_e_3_arcana2"
				"EffectName"	"particles/items_fx/black_king_bar_avatar.vpcf"
				"EffectAttachType"	"follow_origin"
				"States"
				{
					"MODIFIER_STATE_MAGIC_IMMUNE"		"MODIFIER_STATE_VALUE_ENABLED"
				}
				"OnCreated"
				{
					"FireSound"
					{
						"EffectName"	"Item.GiantHunterImmunity"
						"Target" 		"TARGET"
					}
				}

			}
		}
	}
